name: TheFoundation360Briefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
AARP Foundation works to end senior poverty by helping vulnerable older adults build economic opportunity and social connectedness.

This daily Flash Briefing provides information on a range of topics from resources for older job seekers to tips for building social connections.

Important note: The information in this Flash Briefing is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.

To learn more about AARP Foundation, visit: https://www.aarp.org/aarp-foundation/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
